sentences.en: a campaign in Wales for greater autonomy
sentences.cn: 威尔士争取更大自治权的运动

sentences.en: Although he was based in Wales, distance was no object.
sentences.cn: 虽然他主要住在威尔士，但是距离不成问题。

sentences.en: England, Scotland and Wales compose the island of Great Britain.
sentences.cn: 英格兰、苏格兰和威尔士组成大不列颠岛国。

sentences.en: He is grander and even richer than the Prince of Wales.
sentences.cn: 他比威尔士亲王还牛气，甚至更有钱。

sentences.en: His paintings beguiled the Prince of Wales.
sentences.cn: 他的画把威尔士亲王给迷住了。

sentences.en: In Mid-Wales six inches of snow blocked roads.
sentences.cn: 在威尔士的中部地区，6英寸厚的大雪阻塞了道路。

sentences.en: In Wales, 14 people are chasing every job.
sentences.cn: 在威尔士，每份工作都有14个人在竞争。

sentences.en: Last week Wales lost 5-1 to Romania in a World Cup qualifier.
sentences.cn: 在上周的世界杯预选赛中，威尔士队1比5负于罗马尼亚队。

sentences.en: She went to visit relatives in Wales.
sentences.cn: 她去威尔士看望亲戚了。

sentences.en: Similar legislation is already in place in Wales.
sentences.cn: 类似的法规在威尔士已经就位。

sentences.en: The deal marks a turnaround in the fortunes of South Wales Electricity.
sentences.cn: 这一协议标志着南威尔士电力公司时来运转。

sentences.en: The longer he stayed in London the more he hated it, but he could not go back to Wales for he had no job there.
sentences.cn: 他在伦敦呆得时间越长，越憎恶伦敦。 可是，他却不能回到威尔士，因为那里没有他的工作。

sentences.en: The match will be refereed by Derek Bevan from Wales.
sentences.cn: 这场比赛将由来自威尔士的德里克·贝文执法。

sentences.en: The western-most part of north Wales is a stronghold of Welsh-speakers.
sentences.cn: 北威尔士最西部是说威尔士语人的聚居区。

sentences.en: We do depart for Wales on the morrow.
sentences.cn: 我们明天确实要前往威尔士。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 威尔士亲王（英国皇太子之封号）
